mapper.update: update building set name = #{name}, introduction = #{introduction}, admin_id = #{adminId} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select b.id id,b.name name,b.introduction introduction,b.admin_id adminId,a.name adminName from building b,dormitory_admin a where a.id = b.admin_id;
select b.id id,b.name name,b.introduction introduction,b.admin_id adminId,a.name adminName from building b,dormitory_admin a where a.id = b.admin_id and b.name like concat('%',#{value},'%');
select b.id id,b.name name,b.introduction introduction,b.admin_id adminId,a.name adminName from building b,dormitory_admin a where a.id = b.admin_id and b.introduction like concat('%',#{value},'%');
select d.id id from building b,dormitory d where b.id = d.building_id and b.id = #{id};
